categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic squads

nodes.text: White Team was a unit of Alliance to Restore the Republic operatives active in the Mortex sector during the Galactic Civil War. They were led by Untos Poquot, with the Wookiee Worrumba as second in command. Two Humans and two Mon Calamari completed the team. They were part of the Alliance force that captured the Black Ice, but were killed during the assault.
